unterschrift: Half truth - full lie, Michel Raus and Seiji Kimoto
intro_text: Published in 2007, Half truth - full lie is a small booklet with cheerful aphorisms by Luxembourg writer and journalist Michel Rau and calligraphies of Zen wisdom and Haikus by Seiji Kimoto. This poetic collection was published by mediArt, Agency for the Promotion of Culture, and was supported by the Fonds culturel national Luxembourg.
